actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of dog and cat treats as free of duty.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to liquidate or reliquidate as duty-free, and provide for the refund of duties on, certain entries of dog and cat treats in the Chicago, Illinois, Customs District.

titles.title: To provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of dog and cat treats as free of duty.
